messages.content:
Good evening,
Amy my dearest.
You know the reason
why i started this box.
It's because
I am not perfect,
and I mess up.
and I wanted to
give you something no one has.
 I love you
 every day 
more and more.
Even when distance
is long
nights are cold
 memory of you
 and your texts
 make my inside warmer
